name: Doctor Allophone's Fantastic Phonetic Flying Machine
name_original: Doctor Allophone's Fantastic Phonetic Flying Machine
description:
A game created in under 24 hours for the Great Steampunk Game Jam, York, 2016.

Take control of a word-powered flying machine and recover Dr Allophone's bizzare inventions.

Control with the left and right arrow keys in the web player. For Android, face your device towards you and tilt left and right. Keep your flying machine aloft by repeating ridiculous phrases being suggested by Dr Allophone. Requires a quiet space to play.
